participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, always seeking new experiences. Open-minded and supportive of others.
participant_1.background: I wake up, check my schedule for the day, and go about my business. I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business. I was born male and transitioned to female when I was 17. My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques. I like to surf every chance I get.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Passionate and introspective, often reflecting on life through music. Caring and attentive, especially towards family.
participant_2.background: I started writing and recording blues music in my spare time. I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly. My child is the light of my life and helps me take my mind off of my worries. I worry about my image. I am short but my French bulldog is tall.

content.text: Hey there, what are you up to?
Not much, just working on some music. I'm trying to start a blues band.
Oh, that's awesome! I love blues music.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that.
What's your favorite blues song?
It's hard to say, but I really like "Cross Road Blues" by Robert Johnson.
That's a great song! I also like "Hoochie Coochie Man" by Muddy Waters.
Yeah, that's a classic.
What kind of guitar do you play?
I play a Fender Stratocaster.
Nice! I have a Telecaster.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted a Telecaster.
They're great guitars.
I'm sure they are.
So, what's your favorite thing about blues music?
I love the soulfulness of it. It's so expressive.
I agree. It's a very emotional genre of music.
Yeah, it really is.
Do you have any plans to play your music live?
Yeah, I'm hoping to start playing some gigs soon.
That's great! I'd love to come see you play.
Thanks! I'll let you know when I have some shows lined up.
Sounds good
